live_updates: On-site technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
59654.summary: Some customers in the Central Lonsdale area of North Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
59654.title: Apr 1 - North Vancouver (Central Lonsdale) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
